alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 09 at 6:15PM AKST until February 11 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 1 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less. The worst conditions will be Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
